title: Allie Harding: I Don’t Ask Twice￼

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast

transcription: {"text": "Yeah, I don't ask twice. You have to ask more than twice. Someone's not fucking listening. Yeah. Someone's not taking your feelings into consideration. And so it's like, you can have like a reminder, but then it's like, at some point, how many times can I ask for the same thing and get the same reaction before I'm just like, are you even fucking listening to me? If you have to ask more than twice, they're not listening. Oh, you know what I love is that you asked. You know how many times I've been in a relationship where I'm somebody's yelling at me and I'm like, you never said anything. I just rolled my eyes that one time, you could just tell. I'm like, I could just tell. You're like, am I a mind reader? Like what the hell is happening? My exes, I told them both. I was like, you have to say the words. Yeah. That used to make them so angry. I'm like, you remember that thing that you're mad at me about? You have to actually say the words with your mouth or you can't be mad at me. Yeah. That's one rule. I have two rules. Number one, we can't talk about each other behind each other's back. You cannot complain about me to your friends and I'm never going to complain about you to mine. And number two, if you're mad at me about something, you have to tell me immediately. You can't tell me, you can't.
